onedrive_file_added: ${user} added file ${onedrive_path} to Microsoft OneDrive in ${node}
onedrive_file_updated: ${user} updated file ${onedrive_path} in Microsoft OneDrive in ${node}
onedrive_folder_created: ${user} created folder ${onedrive_path} in Microsoft OneDrive in ${node}
onedrive_node_authorized: ${user} authorized the Microsoft OneDrive addon for ${node}
onedrive_node_deauthorized: ${user} deauthorized the Microsoft OneDrive addon for ${node}
